column4: would it be possible for me to install it Ubuntu onto an external harddrive being connected via USB ?
ONTO the harddrive, not FROM it..
that would be .... slow, but I think its possible.

no, that would not work too good.

sorry to tell you this, but you could have saved yourself a lot of hassle, by downloading the alternate install cd, type 'server' at the boot prompt and then typing sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop :)
